vistra.app.control.state

Interface IStepByStep

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.event.FocusListener, IControlContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SbsStateHandler

    public interface IStepByStep
extends IControlContext, java.awt.event.FocusListener, java.awt.event.ActionListener
    An interface for a step-by-step handler: handles the step-by-step iteration over a traversal-object.

    As a part of the graphic user interface control, this state handler is a focus listener (step length setting) and an action listener (buttons), too.

    Author:
    Roland Bruggmann (brugr9@bfh.ch)
    See Also:
    IParameterStateHandler, IAnimation
